summary.span: 建立指定的大小開頭的資料流的提供者在其目前位置。

span.span: Creates a provider for a stream of the specified size beginning at its current position.
The new provider.

remarks.format:
除非指定的資料流擁有權轉移到時成功的引數的驗證。Unless is specified, ownership of the stream is transferred to the upon successful argument validation. 它會處置和呼叫端必須不會管理它。It will be disposed by the and the caller must not manipulate it.
除非指定從資料流讀取任何資料，是將它的建構期間。Unless is specified no data is read from the stream during the construction of the . 此外，資料流必須不由操作時的呼叫端作用中且尚未處置。Furthermore, the stream must not be manipulated by caller while the is alive and undisposed.
如果，則會讀取所有要求在建構期間的資料。If , the will have read all of the data requested during construction. 因此，如果同時指定，則呼叫端保留的資料流的完整擁有權，並可確保，它將不會由操作建構完成之後。As such, if is also specified, the caller retains full ownership of the stream and is assured that it will not be manipulated by the after construction.
]]>

span.span: Size is negative or extends past the end of the stream.

exception.span: 從資料流讀取時發生錯誤 (只有當指定)。

span.span: Error reading from the stream (only when is specified).

remarks.format:
除非指定的資料流擁有權轉移到時成功的引數的驗證。Unless is specified, ownership of the stream is transferred to the upon successful argument validation. 它會處置和呼叫端必須不會管理它。It will be disposed by the and the caller must not manipulate it.
除非指定從資料流讀取任何資料，是將它的建構期間。Unless is specified no data is read from the stream during the construction of the . 此外，資料流必須不由操作時的呼叫端作用中且尚未處置。Furthermore, the stream must not be manipulated by caller while the is alive and undisposed.
如果，則會讀取所有要求在建構期間的資料。If , the will have read all of the data requested during construction. 因此，如果同時指定，則呼叫端保留的資料流的完整擁有權，並可確保，它將不會由操作建構完成之後。As such, if is also specified, the caller retains full ownership of the stream and is assured that it will not be manipulated by the after construction.
]]>
